channel.title: Android on CYBRDiSE
channel.description: Recent content in Android on CYBRDiSE

item.title: Android Debloat
item.description: You can check out the project here. The main goal of this project is to improve battery-life and privacy by removing bloatware. The script has a menu that lets you choose what debloat list you want to use. I strongly encourage you to take a look at the lists because the default selection might not suit you. Almost all packages are documented in order to avoid mishappenings. Tip: You can always FACTORY RESET your phone if in case something goes wrong!
